Articles.Content:
I tried to land on the Mun but i have problem with killing my horizontal velocity,

I heard that MechJeb is god autopilot, I thought this could help me reduce horizontal velocity, during landing

You can find it in the plugin powered add-on section of the add-on board.

Seeing as this was the whole purpose of this thread, it is now no more use, and can be locked, also please use the search feature in future
